name: Regional Office of Podlaskie Voivodeship
goal:
- Development, strengthening and maintaining institutional relations with EU institutions and other relevant internal and external stakeholders;
- Acting as the central point of contact for channelling information and requests of regional authority and other stakeholders;
- Monitoring the implementation of the regionâ€™s working arrangements and cooperation plans;
- Providing advice and support in order to facilitate operational capacity of the various regional bodies;
- Projects management, organising and overseeing administrative support, managing and drafting project budgets and project proposals;
- Preparation of position papers, amendments and reports on issues of particular relevance;
- Representing region in relevant institutional working groups, committees, conferences and events;
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Migration and asylum, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Conceptualising, developing, and managing the work of Interregional Group of Less Developed Regions of the European Committee of the Regions;
- Lobbying on continuation of the Operational Programme Eastern Poland in the financial perspective 2020+
